00030 #ifndef LUBYK_INCLUDE_LUBYK_WORKER_H_
00031 #define LUBYK_INCLUDE_LUBYK_WORKER_H_
00032 /*
00033 Structure of a running planet:
00034 
00035 The Planet is an oscit::Root:
00036 Root   <- Planet
00037 
00038 It contains a single Worker that is passed to subnodes as context
00039 Planet <>--- Worker
00040 */
00041 #include "lubyk/lua.h"
00042 #include "lubyk/thread.h"
00043 #include "lubyk/rmutex.h"
00044 #include "lubyk/time_ref.h"

00095   LuaStackSize spawn(const char *script, lua_State *L);
00096 
00099   void execute(const char *cmd) {
00100     lubyk::Thread *thread = new lubyk::Thread();
00101     thread->startThread<Worker, &Worker::doExecute>(this, (void*)cmd);
00102   }
00103

00118   double now() {
00119     return time_ref_.elapsed();
00120   }

00207 
00208   void doExecute(Thread *runner) {
00209     std::string cmd_ = (const char*)runner->parameter_;
00210     runner->threadReady();
00211     system(cmd_.c_str());
00212     delete runner;
00213   }
00214 };
